abstract: Before studying corals in Fiji, scientists meet with district chiefs and village leaders in ceremonies that often involve extensive socializing and drinking of kava root.
snippet: Before studying corals in Fiji, scientists meet with district chiefs and village leaders in ceremonies that often involve extensive socializing and drinking of kava root.
lead_paragraph: Mark Hay, a biology professor at Georgia Tech, writes from Fiji, where he is investigating coral-seaweed competition in the coral reefs.
